DOC.criteria: 1 . Result standard neuropsychological assessment 2 . Are men postmenopausal woman , least 55 year age . Postmenopausal woman define woman hysterectomy and/or bilateral oophorectomy ; amenorrheic least 2 year ; 3 . Fluency English 4 . Participants mild cognitive impairment ( MCI ) /prodromal mildtomoderate dementia group must assign surrogate purpose inform consent help protocol compliance . 1 . Known suspected diagnosis nonAD , associate dementia ; 2 . Major ophthalmologic comorbidities : Ruptured globe , retinal vascular occlusive disease , retinal artery occlusion , anterior ischemic optic neuropathy , medium opacification due corneal abnormality cataract prevent ocular OCT examination , glaucoma , wet ( neovascular ) agerelated macular degeneration , history intravitreal injection , macular edema . If two eye satisfy inclusion criterion , eye include study .
